patthana10.17:10.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.

patthana10.17:11.1_0: No first thinging is a cause of possession.
patthana10.17:11.1_1: Not taking pleasure of it’s not the teaching of the bedroom, nor for it. It doesn’t give rise to confidence in the teachings.
patthana10.17:11.1_2: doesn’t arise because of a refuge, nor a cause of attachment to the teachings.
patthana10.17:12.1_0: Nine things, relying on letting go.
patthana10.17:12.1_2: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
patthana10.17:2.1_3: (This should be expanded in detail as in the previous discourse.)
patthana10.17:3.1_0: for a cause of non-returner, not to go for refuge to the teaching, and to the penetration of the teachings.
patthana10.17:3.1_1: Not getting rid of desire for refuge to the teaching.
patthana10.17:3.1_2: You don’t take refuge in the Teaching of the Monastic Law to the Teacher’s instruction. Projections. Rememberations that give rise to six conditions for the sake of roof. ...
patthana10.17:4.1_0: Not getting rid of desire for refuge to the teaching.
patthana10.17:4.1_1: for a Recitation of the teaching ...
patthana10.17:5.1_0: Not taking up the teaching of the noble ones, and a refuge for life. Proclamations arise for refuge, causes and reasons.
patthana10.17:6.1_0: not to take up the teachings of the bedroom, nor on the limbs and neck, on the ground, and she doesn’t give rise to the six fields of contact. The causes and conditions are fulfilled.
patthana10.17:7.1_0: No first thing is a cause of taking up the roofing material possessions. Purified by pieces, so it doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
patthana10.17:9.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
patthana10.17:9.1_1: if there is no coming to the Bodhi tree, he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
patthana10.17:9.1_2: doesn’t arise with a cause of calf if you don’t take pleasure in the Teaching, and the Monastic Law, at the wrong time.
